entities.name: purple
entities.description: She mentioned that purple is not her favorite color. She said 'You know, I don’t think purple’s really my color,'.

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a Metamorphmagus who can change her appearance at will. She has spiky hair that turns bubble-gum pink.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is looking at Tonks and seems puzzled by her ability to change her appearance.

relationships.description: Tonks does not like the color purple, as she mentioned 'I don’t think purple’s really my color'.
Harry is puzzled by Tonks’ ability to change her appearance.
